extendedInfo.description: Fight for survival in a world overrun by zombies! Can you stay alive long enough to get your friends to a place of safety? Will you keep your humanity intact or become a bloodthirsty zombie hunter? And will you discover the secret behind the zombie virus? Choice of Zombies is a text-based multiple choice game.

reviews.title: Fun, But Short and Simple
reviews.comment: It was an entertaining game, and I\'m glad I bought the special forces add-on - frankly, playing through it as a trigger happy special forces character was hilarious. That being said, I was pretty disappointed with the game overall. It lacked any real tension, and the character interactions were hollow at times. I wanted to get to know my fellow survivors, but was never given the chance. They\'re pretty much there just to fill space/fill a role. There was also a lack of romance options. In general, the whole story felt rushed. It doesn\'t hold up well compared to their earlier games.
reviews.author: Jeff Peterson

reviews.title: Hm
reviews.comment: I feel a bit cheated that there is more I need to buy
reviews.author: Sarah Forde

reviews.title: Ehh
reviews.comment: Good story but way to short!!!!! I like the zombie kill counter though
reviews.author: Dillon Roark

reviews.title: Good but too short.
reviews.comment: Play the heroes one for 2.99. It is well worth the money as it has several hours more playthrough. This was fun just too short.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: In-app purchases?
reviews.comment: I choose \342\200\246 forceful argument. Why on earth would you put in app purchases in a paid for game, which you\'ve made available for free on the internet? I expected extra content in the market version to be included in the price. This game is fun.. but there\'s no sense in paying for it when you can play it via your browser.
reviews.author: Jj Hassan

reviews.title: Okay but too short
reviews.comment: Anyone who thinks this is better then exodus is either on drugs, or its a fake review. Zombie Exodus is sooo much better, longer, and immersive then any other choice of game i\'ve played next to choice of vampire. Not to mention its free...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great title
reviews.comment: But not fond of the recent update. Why should I pay more for content that I\'ve already paid for?  It\'s too short as it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My fav zombie choice game
reviews.comment: This book is so much better than exodus! The writer is better the plot is better it has humor wich is a must and is so fun u.just have to play it over and over. I have played it at least 10 times and still have yet to find all the poss endings. Wtg! The best! I would pay for this one!

reviews.title: Brains ... brains ...
reviews.comment: Excellent Zombie romp in the style of The Walking Dead (Not sure why the authors felt the need to be rude about us stamp collectors though. Loses one star on account of.)
